text: Hudee hagalongo gi Hezekiah! Di king aamua o Assyria e helekai hiihai bolo goodou gi lloomoi gi daha mo di waahale, gi dugua goodou gi lala ogu mogobuna. Goodou ga dumaalia ginai gi miami nia ‘grape’ mai godou laagau ‘grape’ donu, nia ‘fig’ mai godou laagau ‘fig’ donu, ga inu nia wai mai godou monowai geli donu,
